title: [SOLVED]820-3476-a no green light no power second time
message:
820-3476-A
Hi, guys, this is my first macbook repair, honestly dont thing i would have made it this 
far without watching a bunch of louis rossman videos and pouring thru alot of threads.
Ok, so this board was water damaged and had no power when I got it.
after replacing u5110 I got green light
had short on pp5v_s4..which led me to a short on u6410.
after i replaced that i got the fan to spin...then it died again..no green light
after some searching i found smc_bc_acok was missing...replaced U7100..
Now i have a green light that switches from orange to green and just back and forth..
im missing pp5v_s4 and pp5v_s0 is .024v

I was wondering what creates the pp5v_s4 line? is it u8080
thanks 




ppbus_g3h = 12.6v
ppbus_s5_hs_computing = 12.6v
ppbus_s5_hs_other5v = 12.6v
ppbus_s5_hs_other3v3 = 12.6v
ppdcin_g3h_isol = 16.8v
pp3v42_g3h = 3.4v
pp5v_s5 = 5v
pp5v_s4 = 0v
pp5v_s0 = .024v
smc_pm_g2_en = 3.4v
smc_tx_l = 3.4v

title: [SOLVED]820-3476-a no green light no power second time
message: Many many things are needed to get 5V_S4 to come on. Seeing that u6410 was shorted I have a feeling that the 5V rail went high and killed it. Have you checked all other rails for short to GND? Is PPBUS stable? Is PP3V3_S5 present?

title: [SOLVED]820-3476-a no green light no power second time
message:
Hey thanks alot for the reply, heres what i got:

PPBUS_G3H is stable

and supplemental to my first post readings 

pp3v3_s5 = 3.4v
pp3v3_s4 = .004v
pp3v3_s3 = 3.4v
pp3v3_s0 = 3.4v
pp5v_s0_fet = 5v

no shorts that i can find, seems im missing pp5v_s4/s0 and pp3v3_s4.

title: [SOLVED]820-3476-a no green light no power second time
message: got an ultrasonic cleaner this morning and threw the board in that. Now i get fan spin but CPU gets really hot. still nothing on the pp5v_s4/s0 and pp3v3_s4 lines

title: [SOLVED]820-3476-a no green light no power second time
message: also i just noticed that i can use the power button to turn on the device but only the fan starts to spin

title: [SOLVED]820-3476-a no green light no power second time
message: OK, im finally getting somewhere...replaced U7501 and now device boots, PRAM reset 3 times, can here the chime on boot BUT no image/backlight :(

title: [SOLVED]820-3476-a no green light no power second time
message:
OMG...OMFG...i fixed my 1st macbook:cool: im so fucking cool lol

replaced U8300 and now all is well..

grammy speech:

I def could NOT have done this without this forum, especially [USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER] and all of the youtube vids provided by Louis Rossmann, so thank you guys for all that you do!!
